Reviews.Title: Quick and well Packed
Reviews.Author: N. J. Pienkiewicz "pinky's liquidation"
Reviews.Content: The product arrived as described, well packed and in working condition.  I could not find anything wrong except the length of cables that were provided for each of the cameras.  Other than that it is work in prime condition and the last step is to sync it to my android phone and web site.  Thanks again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; 480TVL Hi-Res cameras provide crisp and detailed video
24IR LEDs for 75ft Automatic night vision; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500 GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; Add up to 16 cameras for large property monitoring
Weather-resistant housing camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather; Anti-vandal mount ensures camera cables cannot be tampered with; Easily connect to DVR with 65ft cables
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT 16CH H.264 500GB Smart Security DVR with 16 Hi-res Outdoor Surveillance Cameras and Smart Phone Compatibility (11045)
